headline: Caterpillar Earnings Reflect Economic Uptick
snippet: Caterpillar posted a stronger-than-expected quarterly profit on Monday as cost cuts and an uptick in demand for its building equipment offset continued weak sales to the mining industry....

headline: Labor Battle at Kellogg Plant in Memphis Drags On
snippet: Kellogg is pressuring for what Caterpillar, Boeing and Detroit’s automakers have sought in recent years — to reduce blue-collar compensation packages....

headline: Senate Report Says Caterpillar Used Swiss Subsidiary to Reduce Taxes
snippet: A Senate investigation, ahead of a Tuesday hearing, says the company avoided $2.4 billion in United States taxes over 13 years....

headline: At Hearing, Caterpillar Defends Tax Practices
snippet: Members of a Senate panel accused Caterpillar of channeling its most profitable operations through a subsidiary in Switzerland....

headline: Switching Names to Save on Taxes
snippet: Caterpillar ducked billions of dollars in United States income taxes with a simple strategy. Whether it was legal is open to debate....

headline: Market Extends a Losing Streak as Earnings Roll In
snippet: Stocks moved lower in afternoon trading after disappointing earnings from several big companies, including American Express, Caterpillar and 3M....

headline: Caterpillar to Cut Up to 10,000 Jobs, Citing Falling Demand
snippet: The announcement from Caterpillar, which has been a symbol of American exporting might, helped drive down major stock indexes....

headline: Morning Agenda: Snap, Caterpillar’s Tax, Masayoshi Son, Harvard Donor
snippet: Snap’s spectacular debut has left some investors wondering how the company can be worth so much, while others just seem eager to jump aboard the marquee offering....

headline: U.S. Agents Raid Caterpillar Over Offshore Tax Practices
snippet: Caterpillar has been dogged by accusations that it reduced its domestic tax bill by shifting profits from the United States to a subsidiary in Switzerland....

headline: Caterpillar Is Accused in Report to Federal Investigators of Tax Fraud
snippet: The report outlines a strategy for bringing home billions of dollars from offshore affiliates while avoiding federal income taxes on the earnings....
